name: places/ChIJ1QlZ4KhZwokRLX7Vn4t-G4s
formattedAddress: 25 W 32nd St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 25 W 32nd St, New York, NY 10001-3806, USA

originalText.text: Went here for the first time with my mom and really enjoyed it. Friendly staff, helped with the choice of service for me and my mother. Very cozy calm place. We opted for a scrub and one hour massage. The spa has absolutely everything from slippers to personal hygiene items. Before the scrub itself, we used the sauna, hot baths, Steam room, and then we went to the scrub. The scrub was painless very gentle, it was my first time when someone did a scrub for me with gloves and I was pleasantly surprised by the result after, my skin just shine and breathed. After the scrub, we went to another floor for a massage and it was so relaxing, all my stress was gone. At the end of all our procedures, we were served tea with pineapple. My mom and I were very pleased with the service and overall spa experience. The prices are quite adequate for Manhattan, I really liked that there are private rooms for massage and scrub that they are made separately. We will definitely come back it was a very cool experience. Thank you!

originalText.text: Very good experience. A spa in Manhattan, right by broadway. We took the general admission, it was nice. Bath with hot water and lemons, salt steamed rooms and so many more. You're given tea and pineapple. They bring you cold water in the sauna too. Very good service. You're pampered like a baby.

originalText.text:
I‚Äôve been coming here for two years and it is such a safe haven for me. Yes, I agree that it is a bit small, but it‚Äôs very intimate, never feels overcrowded, and the staff is really wonderful.

I typically come here for facials and the body scrub.

Today June did my body scrub, and I felt like a brand new person when I was done with the session. She was absolutely wonderful. After my session I was served tea and pineapple. I was able to stay for a while to continue relaxing in the hot tub and took a dip in the cold pool before heading out.

For the price, you really can‚Äôt beat it! I can‚Äôt recommend enough!

Oh- if it‚Äôs your first time, pay with cash if you can. If you pay with a card there is a 4% cc fee. No biggie? Just a heads up.

Can‚Äôt wait to visit again!

originalText.text: Words is honestly not enough to explain. I had an amazing experience for it to be my first time. Everyone was so kind, sweet, and very helpful. The lady that I had to do my spa was very welcoming I made sure to leave her a tip. Not only her everyone was welcoming. Nothing was rushed, she also took her time. I can literally live thereü¶ã. I met a few people there as well. Thank you Juvenex Spa üßñüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è for making me feel welcomed. I highly recommend, pls visit the place.

originalText.text: I came here around 1 am it was a really nice atmosphere, but after paying almost $600 I am very unsatisfied with the outcome, the massage was not worth it. I was in more pain after I left, then when I came here. The masseuse didn‚Äôt even give me privacy to get undressed and she jumped on my back during the massage. The jacuzzi was a melting pot inside of a heated room‚Ä¶ I felt as if I was going to faint if I didn‚Äôt get out from the heat. The only good thing about this experience was the lemon bath & champagne. Would I ever come back ? No. Would I recommend this to anymore ?  Absolutely not
